about_the_game:
Autumn 1997.

In a small and quiet English town, a group of former university classmates celebrate their tenth graduation anniversary with a dinner party. What seems like a quiet reunion unexpectedly turns into an adventure full of mysteries, lies and death.

Solve the crime that has led to you being the main suspect in the murder of one of your classmates and complete ingenious puzzles to decipher the identity of the real murderer.

A story full of mystery, and secrets that an ancient order tries to protect.

Will you be able to uncover the motives and identity of the murderer and prove your innocence?

From the creator of The Adventures of The Black Hawk, comes Lost Key - The Path of Illumination, a classic graphic adventure that will transport you back to the 90's through a mysterious and exciting thriller.

Main features

  • A trip back to the point & click adventure games of the 80's and 90's with an easy game system.
  • Solve puzzles and foil an ancient conspiracy that will change the world as we know it...
  • Enjoy hand-painted backgrounds and characters reminiscent of 80's adventure games.
  • Let yourself become immersed in an original soundtrack that will captivate you from the very first moment.

short_description: An ancient order that protects a secret, kept hidden for centuries. An unexpected crime that causes you to be accused of the murder of a friend. Solve the mysteries and puzzles of a story full of esotericism to prove the truth about your innocence and hold the real murderer responsible.
